channel.title: Data Visualization on
channel.description: Recent content in Data Visualization on

item.title: Data Visualization Introduction
item.description: Preface # I started planning this series to share my data visualization lecture notes. But, over the past week, it has turned into something much bigger. As I learn more about data visualization, I realized there’s more I want to share. This is not intended as a tutorial or a comprehensive guide. It is just me sharing some notes and thoughts and hoping you find it useful. What is Data Visualization?
